name: Kitty Time
description:
Be a cat. Knock things over, make some noise, score some points.

Based on the lived experience of someone living with kittens for 9 months of the lockdown.

Best played with a controller.

Controls:

Left Stick/WASD/Arrow Keys: Move

Right Stick/Mouse: Camera

A Button/Spacebar: Jump

A Button/Enter: Select in UI

Left Trigger/Right Trigger/Shift: Boost

Start/Escape: Pause
